sentences: Jiří Kabeš, alias Kába (* 26 March 1946 in Křemín, Czechoslovakia) is a Czech rock singer, violist, violinist, guitarist and songwriter.

Jiří Kabeš, alias Kába (* 26 March 1946 in Křemín, Czechoslovakia) is a Czech rock singer, violist, violinist, guitarist and songwriter. He was a longtime member of The Plastic People of the Universe where he played on viola and violin, occasionally sang and played on theremin.
Since 1997 he is also a member of The Velvet Underground Revival Band where he plays the guitar.
Since 1997 he is also a member of The Velvet Underground Revival Band where he plays the guitar. He was also a member of Milan Hlavsa's band called Půlnoc and Echt!.
Vožralej jak slíva (released: 1997, recorded: 1973-1975) - live album
Egon Bondy’s Happy Hearts Club Banned (released: 2001, recorded: 1974-75)
Muž bez uší (released: 2002, recorded 1969-72) - live album
